channel.title: Maui on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Maui on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: Maui whales
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: The only regret I have from our recent trip to Maui is my zero involvement in any of the trip planning. We could have gone kayaking to see the whales up close. Such a missed opportunity…Next time I guess!

item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: Working with S on her first ever Junior ranger activity sitting right above the clouds. The park ranger sneaked in an ’eating vegetables’ pact in her oath and handed over a pretty cool wooden badge.

item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: Super short hike up to the overlook. Absolutely mesmerized to see the Tradewinds holding down the sea of clouds!
